dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, welcome back to the Space Bits podcast! Today, uh, we've got some interesting news from the world of private spaceflight.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, welcome back to the Space Bits podcast! Today, uh, we've got some interesting news from the world of private spaceflight.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. Big news, right? Jeff Bezos's Blue Origin, like, reportedly just wrapped up a huge fundraising round.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. Big news, right? Jeff Bezos's Blue Origin, like, reportedly just wrapped up a huge fundraising round.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Billionaire Elon Musks rocket company SpaceX reportedly completed an $850 million fundraising round last week, as it looks to raise capital for its ambitious Starlink and Starship projects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, a whopping $750 million! I mean, they're really looking to fuel some of their ambitious projects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, a whopping seven hundred fifty million dollars! I mean, they're really looking to fuel some of their ambitious projects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Billionaire Elon Musks rocket company SpaceX reportedly completed an $850 million fundraising round last week...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And Bloomberg reported this first, saying it pushes their valuation up to a massive $78 billion. That's, uh, quite a jump.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And Bloomberg reported this first, saying it pushes their valuation up to a massive seventy eight billion dollars. That's, uh, quite a jump.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: News of the funding was first reported by CNBC, which said that the private company will now have a valuation of around $74 billion, citing people familiar with the financing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And get this, the shares were sold at $421.99. That's, like, just a cent above Elon Musk's famous 420 tweet, right? Kind of a cheeky nod?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And get this, the shares were sold at four hundred twenty one dollars and ninety nine cents. That's, like, just a cent above Elon Musk's famous four hundred twenty tweet, right? Kind of a cheeky nod?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company raised new funds at $419.99 per share, per CNBC. That price is just a cent below $420 per share...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Yeah, definitely feels like it, doesn't it? Like, a little inside joke from the space billionaires.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely feels like it, doesn't it? Like, a little inside joke from the space billionaires.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But here's where it gets even more wild, according to Forbes' calculations, Musk actually owned about 60% of Blue Origin before this round.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But here's where it gets even more wild, according to Forbes calculations, Musk actually owned about sixty percent of Blue Origin before this round.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Muskwho is the worlds second-richest person, behind Amazon AMZN +1.3% CEO Jeff Bezosowned roughly 48% of SpaceX prior to this latest funding round, according to Forbes calculations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, Elon Musk owned 60% of *Blue Origin*? That's... uh... that's a lot. The article says Forbes calculated that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, Elon Musk owned sixty percent of Blue Origin? That's... uh... that's a lot. The article says Forbes calculated that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's what it says! And if he held onto that, his stake would now be worth, like, $46 billion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's what it says! And if he held onto that, his stake would now be worth, like, forty six billion dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If he managed to hold onto all 48%, his stake would now be worth about $32 billionup from roughly $20 billion previously, according to Forbes estimates.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, an $11 billion boost to his net worth just from this. That's insane.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, an eleven billion dollar boost to his net worth just from this. That's insane.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That would boost Musks net worth by $12 billionbut thats still not enough for him to pass Bezos and retake the spot of the richest person on the planet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And they're raising all this cash for their big projects, like Starship and Starlink.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And they're raising all this cash for their big projects, like Starship and Starlink.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The latest fundraising round comes in the midst of two capital-intensive projects, Starship and Starlink.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, Starship, that's their long-term spacecraft, aiming to be fully reusable, you know, carrying cargo and passengers to space at a lower cost.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, Starship, that's their long-term spacecraft, aiming to be fully reusable, you know, carrying cargo and passengers to space at a lower cost.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The aim of the project is to develop a fully-reusable launch vehicle that is expected to take cargo, and eventually passengers, into space at a lower cost than other existing spacecraft.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Mmm-hmm. And then Starlink, their satellite broadband service. Remember the demand for that? Though, uh, scaling capacity has been a challenge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mmm-hmm. And then Starlink, their satellite broadband service. Remember the demand for that? Though, uh, scaling capacity has been a challenge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: SpaceX said in 2020 that it was seeing extraordinary demand for its Starlink satellite broadband service... but the service faces criticism over its cost and the companys ability to scale capacity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. It's like, great speeds for gaming and streaming, but can they *really* deliver to everyone?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. It's like, great speeds for gaming and streaming, but can they really deliver to everyone?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: So far, early tests have shown broadbands speeds capable of playing online video games and streaming movies...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, they were previously valued at $50 billion in 2020, but Goldman Sachs was way more bullish, putting it at $110 billion. So, $78 billion is kind of in the middle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, they were previously valued at fifty billion dollars in twenty twenty, but Goldman Sachs was way more bullish, putting it at one hundred ten billion dollars. So, seventy eight billion dollars is kind of in the middle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: SpaceX was last valued at $46 billion in an August 2020 fundraising round. But some Wall Street banks had put that value even higher: In October, a Morgan Stanley MS -1.5% analyst gave SpaceX a bullish valuation of $100 billion...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's a pretty wide range, isn't it? Makes you wonder, like, what's the true value?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's a pretty wide range, isn't it? Makes you wonder, like, what's the true value?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And on top of the fundraising, there was also a secondary transaction where insiders and investors sold off another $650 million in shares.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And on top of the fundraising, there was also a secondary transaction where insiders and investors sold off another six hundred fifty million dollars in shares.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition to raising money for its large-scale projects, SpaceX also completed a secondary transaction in which SpaceX insiders and investors were able to sell an additional $750 million worth of their shares, according to CNBC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a lot of money moving around in space, uh, it seems. The space race is definitely heating up, and the valuations are just, like, out of this world.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a lot of money moving around in space, uh, it seems. The space race is definitely heating up, and the valuations are just, like, out of this world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No pun intended, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No pun intended, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] Exactly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly.
